source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.

generated_critique: The caption describes the static scenery but fails to describe the motion of the subjects as required by the instructions. The video contains salient moving subjects, specifically cars and pedestrians. The caption should be revised to focus on their movement, describing how cars, including a blue car, a dark bus, and a silver van, drive along the road, while a few pedestrians walk on the sidewalk. The current description of the buildings, sidewalks, and weather is not relevant to the motion-focused instructions and should be omitted.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: From a sidewalk perspective, a blue car drives past a dark-colored bus on a multi-lane city street. A silver van follows further down the road, and a few pedestrians can be seen walking along the sidewalk on the left.
